title: The Microshift Sword gravel groupset brings wide range gearing to the masses
content:
This new 10-speed gravel bike groupset features wide-range 1x or 2x gearing and impressive levels of repairability at an accessible price point.

Read the full article at The Microshift Sword gravel groupset brings wide range gearing to the masses on Velo.
author: Alvin Holbrook
